Actions.Name: Checkout project
Actions.Description: Checks out an existing project in your site.

Actions.Name: Creates new project
Actions.Description: Creates a new project in your project online site.

Actions.Name: Create new resource
Actions.Description: Creates an Enterprise Resource in your Project Online site.

Actions.Name: Creates new task
Actions.Description: Creates a new task in you project.

Actions.Name: Get project summary task
Actions.Description: Gets the project summary task for a given project.

Actions.Name: List project
Actions.Description: Lists a project by Id in your project online site.

Actions.Name: List projects
Actions.Description: Lists the projects in your project online site.

Actions.Name: Lists tasks
Actions.Description: Lists the published tasks in a project.

Actions.Name: When a new project is created
Actions.Description: Triggers a flow whenever a new project is created.

Actions.Description: Triggers a flow whenever a new project is created.

Actions.Name: When a new resource is created
Actions.Description: Triggers a new flow when a new resource is created.

Actions.Name: When a new resource is created (V2) (Preview)
Actions.Description: Triggers a new flow when a new resource is created.

Actions.Name: When a new task is created
Actions.Description: Triggers a flow when a new task is created.

Actions.Name: When a new task is created (V2) (Preview)
Actions.Description: Triggers a flow when a new task is created.

Actions.Name: When a project is published
Actions.Description: Triggers a flow whenever a project is published.

Actions.Name: When a project is published (V2) (Preview)
Actions.Description: Triggers a flow whenever a project is published.

Actions.Name: Checkin and publish project
Actions.Description: Check in and publish an existing project in your site.
